Create a Tacacs Group Map

To create a group map,

 1. In the Tacacs Group Map Configuration page, enter the Tacacs group name in the Name field.

 2. From the Role drop-down list, select the required default role you wish to assign for the Tacacs database.

 3. From the Locale drop-down list, select the locale you wish to assign for the role type.

 4. Click Add to create a Tacacs group map for the database.
